label: 貞観永宝
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: A series of copper coins.  It was ordered (in 870.2.29; Jōgan 12.1.25) that coins bearing the inscription Jōgan-eihō be minted.  Each coin was to be equivalent in value to ten of the old coins (Part A, p. 262).
